definition: style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
veiled design incised in porcelain or woven in fabric
erhua variant of 開花|开花[kai1 hua1]

sentences.english: "What are those good-smelling flowers with thorns called again?" he eventually asks.
sentences.chinese: 那种好闻又带刺的花儿叫什么名字来着？

sentences.english: Melissa and Henry accept the annuals.
Yhe trees turn green and the flowers start coming out.
sentences.chinese: 此树变绿了，和花儿开始出来。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the flower you have mentioned is nothing but a cabbage!
sentences.chinese: 另外，你所说的花儿只不过是一棵白菜。

sentences.english: Good, because I don't think my girlfriend would be too happy with sick flowers!
sentences.chinese: 很好，我想我女朋友也不会太喜欢带病的花儿。

sentences.english: But the flower was not satisfied to complete the preparations for her beauty in the shelter of her green chamber.
sentences.chinese: 可是，花儿并不满足于藏在绿房里精心打扮。

sentences.english: To him, the birds sang. The squirrel chattered and the flowers bloomed.
sentences.chinese: 鸟而向他歌唱，松鼠对他叽咕，花儿也为他开放。

sentences.english: Each flower is a butterfly turned from youth, whose free flutter is driven by the power of love.
sentences.chinese: 朵朵花儿都是青春的化蝶，爱的力量使它自由飘飞。

sentences.english: She said the flowers were a true blessing.
sentences.chinese: 她说那些花儿是一种实实在在的祝福。

sentences.english: When flowers are in their tombs.
sentences.chinese: 当花儿已经葬入了坟冢。

sentences.english: These blessed flowers were perfect. They didn’t have a single blemish.
sentences.chinese: 这些赏心悦目的花儿真美，它们没有一处瑕疵。

sentences.english: Our loves are like flower similar and fresh and gorgeous brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 我们的爱像花儿一样鲜艳夺目。

sentences.english: Beautiful and stylish lamps designed for people that love flowers.
sentences.chinese: 这美丽时髦的灯是为喜欢花儿的人们设计的。

sentences.english: The flowers opened to the sun.
Apple orchards blossom there, and the air's like wine.
sentences.chinese: 苹果园花儿绽放空气飘酒香。

definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
(of a plant) to be in bud
